Package javazoom.jl.player.advanced

Class Summary
AdvancedPlayer a hybrid of javazoom.jl.player.Player tweeked to include play(startFrame, endFrame) hopefully this will be included in the api
jlap This class implements a sample player using Playback listener.
PlaybackEvent An event which indicates a Player has performed an 'playback action'
PlaybackListener Listener for javalayer Player playback
